languages.text: "Ты? Из всех, кто когда-либо угрожал мне, ты — сам{mf|ый|ая} жалк{mf|ий|ая}, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка}. Ты получил{mf||а} все, чем ныне владеешь, по ошибке. Ты недосто{mf|ен|йна} столь щедрого дара и не способ{mf|ен|на} удержать его".

traits.locale_text: "Ты? Из всех, кто когда-либо угрожал мне, ты — сам{mf|ый|ая} жалк{mf|ий|ая}, {mf|мальчик|девочка}. Ты получил{mf||а} все, чем ныне владеешь, и не способ{mf|ен|на} удержать его".
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."
languages.original_text: "Ты? Из всех, кто когда-либо угрожал мне, ты — сам{mf|ый|ая} жалк{mf|ий|ая}, {mf|мальчишка|девчонка}. Ты получил{mf||а} все, чем ныне владеешь, по ошибке. Ты недосто{mf|ен|йна} столь щедрого дара и не способ{mf|ен|на} удержать его".

traits.locale_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

traits.locale_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: “就凭你？那么多人曾威胁过我，但你却是最可悲的那个，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}。你现在所拥有的一切，都是你不该得到的东西。你不配享受如此慷慨的礼物，你根本没有能力将它握在手中。”
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: “就凭你？那么多人曾威胁过我，但你却是最可悲的那个，{mf|小伙子|小姑娘}。你现在所拥有的一切，都是你不该得到的东西。你不配享受如此慷慨的礼物，你根本没有能力将它握在手中。”
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: «¿Tú? De toda la gente que me ha amenazado, tú eres {mf|el|la} más patétic{mf|o|a}, muchach{mf|o|a}. Todo lo que tienes ahora se te entregó por error. No eres dign{mf|o|a} de un regalo tan generoso, y tampoco capaz de conservarl{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Tú? De toda la gente que me ha amenazado, tú eres {mf|el|la} más patétic{mf|o|a}, muchach{mf|o|a}. Todo lo que tienes ahora se te entregó por error. No eres dign{mf|o|a} de un regalo tan generoso, y tampoco capaz de conservarl{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: 「あなたが？私を脅かしてきた者の中で、あなたが一番哀れな存在よ。あなたが今持っているものはすべて、誤って与えられたもの。あなたはそのような寛大な贈り物に値しないし、それを持ち続けることすらできない存在に過ぎないの」
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが？私を脅かしてきた者の中で、あなたが一番哀れな存在よ。あなたが今持っているものはすべて、誤って与えられたもの。あなたはそのような寛大な贈り物に値しないし、それを持ち続けることすらできない存在に過ぎないの」
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Du? Von allen Leuten, die mir je gedroht haben, bist du {mf|der Armseligste, Junge|die Armseligste, Mädchen}. Alles, was du jetzt besitzt, wurde dir irrtümlich überlassen. Du bist eines so großzügigen Geschenks nicht würdig und unfähig, es zu bewahren."
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: "Du? Von allen Leuten, die mir je gedroht haben, bist du {mf|der Armseligste, Junge|die Armseligste, Mädchen}. Alles, was du jetzt besitzt, wurde dir irrtümlich überlassen. Du bist eines so großzügigen Geschenks nicht würdig und unfähig, es zu bewahren."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: « Laissez-moi rire. De tous les gens qui m'ont jamais menacée, vous êtes {mf|le|la} plus pathétique, {mf|sale morveux|sale morveuse}. Tout ce que vous possédez vous a été donné par erreur. Vous êtes indigne d'un tel cadeau et vous seriez bien incapable de le défendre. »
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: « Laissez-moi rire. De tous les gens qui m'ont jamais menacée, vous êtes {mf|le|la} plus pathétique, {mf|sale morveux|sale morveuse}. Tout ce que vous possédez vous a été donné par erreur. Vous êtes indigne d'un tel cadeau et vous seriez bien incapable de le défendre. »
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit

languages.text: "Sen mi? Hayatım boyunca beni tehdit eden herkesten daha acınasısın sen. Sahip olduğun hiçbir şeyi hak etmedin. Böyle cömert bir armağana layık değilsin, zaten elinde tutamayacak kadar da beceriksizsin."
languages.original_text: "You? Of all the people to ever threaten me, you are the most pathetic, {mf|boy|girl}. All that you possess now was given to you in error. You are unworthy of such a generous gift and you are incapable of holding onto it."

traits.locale_text: "Sen mi? Hayatım boyunca beni tehdit eden herkesten daha acınasısın sen. Sahip olduğun hiçbir şeyi hak etmedin. Böyle cömert bir armağana layık değilsin ve onu elinde tutamayacak kadar beceriksizsin."
traits.speaker: TheodoraUnit
